title: Folding Stool by Alex Carseon, Small, Lightweight, Portable seat. Foldable Tripod Camp Chair for Camping, Fishing, Travel, Parks, Photography, Outdoor Concerts, Soccer Games, Sports Events, Gardening
features: Collapsible stool, folds to 3" diameter. Weights less than 1.5 lbs

description: A folding portable camping stool to carry with you or keep in the trunk of your car.

Perfect for camping, fishing, hunting, picnics, swap meets, golfing, waiting in line, conventions and outdoor shows, bus stops, patio, garden, outdoor markets, sporting events, barbeques and much more.  Durable construction: cross woven polyester fabric seat and powder coated steel legs. Includes adjustable carry strap.  Folds and stores easily.  13" x 13" wide x 17.2" high  Weights a little over 1 lb.  Supports weight up to 200 lbs
